content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (Position x=1-3, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (1,1) and (3,1)
- Two wooden chests at (1.5,3.5) and (3.5,3.5) storing iron plates
- Two burner inserters at (1.5,2.5) and (3.5,2.5) moving items from furnaces to chests

### Copper Plate Production Line (Position x=2-4, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (2,7) and (4,7)
- Two wooden chests at (2.5,9.5) and (4.5,9.5)
- Three burner inserters at (2.5,8.5), (3.5,9.5), and (4.5,8.5)
- Transport belt connecting furnaces

### Copper Cable Assembly Line (Position x=14.5, y=11.5-14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (14.5,14.5)
- Input chest at (14.5,11.5)
- Burner inserter at (14.5,12.5)
- Output chest at (11.5,14.5) containing copper cables
- Burner inserter at (12.5,14.5) moving finished products

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line (Position x=21.5, y=11.5-15.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (21.5,15.5)
- Input chests at (21.5,11.5) and (21.5,12.5)
- Burner inserter at (21.5,13.5)

### Power Generation System (Position x=2.5-13.5, y=35.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (2.5,35.5)
- Boiler at (7.0,35.5)
- Steam engine at (13.5,35.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric pole network distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Power System Issues
- Ensure boiler has fuel loaded before expecting power generation
- Connect all power-consuming entities to the electricity network using electric poles

### Assembly Machine Issues
- Ensure proper supply of input materials before starting assembly operations
- Check that input inserters are properly positioned and fueled
- Verify recipe requirements match available resources

### Fluid System Issues
- Ensure proper pipe connections between fluid-producing and consuming entities
- Check that offshore pumps are placed adjacent to water
- Verify fluid flow direction matches entity requirements

### Belt and Inserter Placement
- Ensure transport belts form continuous paths between source and destination
- Position inserters with correct pickup and drop-off points
- Verify inserters have sufficient fuel to operate
